_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The impossibility for a person accomplis: to take any condition as permanent
to take any condition as pleasant
to injure a Realized One with malicious intent
to cause a schism in the Saṅgha
The possibility for an ordinary person [: to take some condition as permanent
to take some condition as pleasant
to injure a Realized One with malicious intent
to cause a schism in the Saṅgha
The impossibility for two perfected ones: to arise in the same solar system at the same time
The possibility for just one perfected o: to arise in one solar system
